1.0.name: wordpress/javascript-libraries-loader
1.0.description:
This plugin will add a link to a number of the popular javascript libraries. You can choose from the following:

  • jQuery
  • jQuery UI
  • prototype
  • mootools
  • dojo
  • scriptaloucious

You can specify if it should added at the top of your page (in the head of the document) or, as is popular today at the bottom of the page - just before the body tag.
